12/8/2023, updated on 13/8/2023, 14/8/20: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)
Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2023), Attorney General Chambers. Refer to individual State Candidate Age Source File

There may be discrepancies for the age of candidates as there is no official data released for the attribute. Following Corrections were made for the DUN seats for Perikatan Nasional (Party Allocation) - Kok Lanas, Gual Ipoh, Bukit Bunga, Air Lanas, Nenggiri, Paloh, Hulu Besut, Permaisuri, Seberang Takir, Telemung, Kijal. Corrections were made for missing data pertaining to Candidates who Lost Deposit. Correction was made for the Gender of DAP Candidate of Pengkalan Kota and Gerakan Candidate of Datok Keramat. Corrections were made for valid votes for PAS Candidates (Bukit Lada, Demit), UMNO (Bukit Payung and Kota Putera), DAP (Jawi) and Muda (Kuala Kubu Baharu). Corrections were made for Candidate Valid Votes for DAP Candidate (Kampung Tunku), PAS Candidate (Paya Jaras) and PPBM Candidate (Dengkil). There are different interpretations of total valid votes for different parties based on different sources. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
State Name
Parliamentary Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Parliamentary Name (2018 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Name (2018 - present at the created Date)
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector count using the Principal Electoral Roll of 2022 and updated until April 2023 which was gazetted on 22/5/2023
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll (as in A in all Form 14 + A in Form 15)
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box (as in D in all Form 14) and not returned (as in D in Form 15) (B-C-D)
Total number of rejected ballot papers (as in C in all Form 14 + C in Form 15)
Total number of votes by electors
